CustomField.formula:
IF (
OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "Request"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "In Authoring")), HYPERLINK("/apex/APTS_CombineDocs?id="&Id , IMAGE("/resource/APT_MergeDocuments", "Merge Contract Documents"),"_self"), NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Merge multiple documents together into one single PDF file
CustomField.label: Merge Contract Documents
